title: The Lost Moment (1947 Film-Noir) Directed by Martin Gabel - Venice’s Secrets Are Never Silent

sources.title: The Lost Moment (1947 Film-Noir) Directed by Martin Gabel - Venice’s Secrets Are Never Silent
sources.description:
Ambitious publisher, Lewis Venable infiltrates the eerie Venetian mansion of the enigmatic Juliana Bordereau, a 105-year-old recluse, to unearth priceless love letters. As he navigates Tina Bordereau's fractured psyche and a web of fiery secrets, the past ignites a perilous game of obsession and survival.

Original title: The Lost Moment
Alternative title: The Aspern Papers, The Lost Love

Director: Martin Gabel
Writers: Leonardo Bercovici, Henry James

Main cast:
Robert Cummings - Lewis Venable
Susan Hayward - Tina Bordereau
Agnes Moorehead - Juliana Bordereau

Genres: Drama, Film-Noir, Romance, Thriller
Release date: November 21, 1947
Filming location: Venice, Italy
